physical_appearance:This is a photograph of a waterfall in Penang
 Malaysia. The waterfall is in the center of the photograph
 amidst thick vegetation on either side. At the bottom left of the photograph
 there is a small sheltered dwelling. A man is standing by the railings in front of the dwelling. To his right
 there are three men sitting along the bridge at the bottom of the waterfall. There is another man sitting on a rock on the right of the photograph. The title is written at the bottom
 below the photograph.

metadata.physical_appearance: This is a photograph of a waterfall in Penang, Malaysia. The waterfall is in the center of the photograph, amidst thick vegetation on either side. At the bottom left of the photograph, there is a small sheltered dwelling. A man is standing by the railings in front of the dwelling. To his right, there are three men sitting along the bridge at the bottom of the waterfall. There is another man sitting on a rock on the right of the photograph. The title is written at the bottom, below the photograph.
metadata.subject_terms_2: Photographs Thomson, J. (John), 1837-1921 Waterfalls Pulau Pinang (Malaysia : State)
